name: Weald
description:
Weald is a set of simple, modular procedures for fantasy gaming.

Weald's core ruleset is complete, but the project as a whole is still in development.

If you like Weald and want to talk about it or make a suggestion to it's features or text,
join us on the Secret Hearth discord.

What's next for Weald?

a. Complete art.
b. Release a hard copy zine of the core manual.
c. Release additional materials: items, classes, etc.
